Posts.Content: Hi Everyone, Happy New Year, I have a question which I am sure most have experienced. The gland under my left breast seems to be inflamed. I had a mammogram a few months ago which was unremarkable. I am a 34B so I don't believe it was even filmed. Best wishes and thank you for you help. Lori
Posts.Title: Lump Under Breast

Posts.Content: Lauri, To clarify the mammagram was negitive. I guess I don't know for sure if it is a gland or duct. I have an appointment with my ob/gyn on Monday and will post the results. TY
Posts.Title: Lump Under Breast

Posts.Content: Hi, I went to see the doctor and she sent me for an ultrasound but they couldn't see anything. She explained that fatty tissue doesn't show up. I have an appointment with a surgery tomorrow and I guess he will determine what to do biosy ... Today I had echo-stress test and the tech was able to see the mass. She didn't want to speculate on what it was but I thought that was interesting.
Posts.Title: Lump Under Breast

Posts.Content: I went to see the surgeon, he said he would have to remove the mass because nothing showed up on the ultrasound. I am scheduled for surgery next week. Am I doing everything I should to evaluate the situation? Thank you, Lori
Posts.Title: Lump Under Breast
